data.oai_dc:dc: Sheet 1 contains genotypes for 6 chloroplast microsatellite (cpSSR) loci and Sheet 2 contains genotypes for 6 nuclear microsatellite (nSSR) loci for each valley oak (Quercus lobata) sample. GPS coordinates, sample code and population codes are also given. Sheet 3 is a readme file indicating which additional articles to cite when using the data.
